messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did the Old Ones reduce their bases to the tops of certain mountains?
A hundred million years ago.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What intelligent arachnids are prophesied to be the last intelligent life on Earth, billions of years hence?
The intelligent arachnids.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What kind of beings inhabit Earth alongside humans?
deep ones, ghouls, and a handful of mi-go
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of each player in Call of Cthulhu?
an investigator, tasked with uncovering hidden secrets and standing against the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary role of an investigator in Call of Cthulhu?
An investigator, someone whose mission is to unearth hidden secrets, discover forgotten places, and stand against the bloodcurdling horrors of the Cthulhu Mythos.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main focus of this chapter in Call of Cthulhu?
Creating investigator player characters
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why are the characteristic values written down first?
The characteristic values are initially written down on a piece of scrap paper before being written onto the final version.
